about_the_game:
Kaiju Cleaner is a simulation game with the theme of cleaning Kaiju. In the game, you will play a professional cleaning sifu complete one cleaning order after another. As the orders increase, you will find your customers more and more strange, and you have to deal with the "animal" is also more and more difficult to deal with. It's time to test your professional skills.

A relaxing and intense cleaning experience


Get relaxed by the squealing of different water guns, and your mind will be cleansed as the dust and dirt is clean away. But be careful. At first, your customers may be more obedient and quiet enough to let you do the clean, but as you work more and more, the real challenge will come.

Those huge creatures, are not so easy to deal with, you have to show your true professional level, using the tools you can use, play your ability to prove to everyone that you are the real master of cleaning: yes, whether it is ordinary animals, or ...... Kaiju, you can handle it!

It‘s Kaiju？to clean！


The game has a wide variety of creatures waiting for you to clean them out. From small animals, to huge Kaiju. Each animal has its own personality, temperament and preferences. Smaller animals may not require much preparation on your part to complete clean smoothly, using your existing experience to handle them easily and finish your work leisurely.

But when faced with a huge monster, your past experience is not enough. Understanding the monster's characteristics and temperament, preparing enough tools, and using your unique skills will enable you to successfully complete this huge job. And of course the payoff is huge too. Do your homework before you go. You don't want to lose your life because of your job.

Get your tools ready


Water guns, cleaners, different sprinklers and extension accessories. Using the right tools for different kinds of dirt is a basic skill of a professional. Believe that with the right tools, you will be able to handle it. When facing with a huge Kaiju, there may be some unexpected tools that can help you get more done with less effort.

Use the money you earn to expand your toolbox. You must sharpen your tools to do a good job.
